variant.description: The different appearance variants for a button. [Avoid using link variants when possible.](https://paste.twilio.design/components/button#button-vs-anchor-link)

as.description: The HTML tag to replace the default `<button>` tag.

disabled.description: Prevent actions from firing on this Button

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider.

fullWidth.description: Sets the Button width to 100% of the parent container.

href.description: A URL to route to. Must use as="a" for this prop to work.

i18nExternalLinkLabel.defaultValue: '(link takes you to an external page)'

loading.description: Prevent actions and show a loading spinner

pressed.description: Sets the aria-pressed attribute. Must be used with 'secondary' or 'secondary_icon' variants.

type.description: Use at least one `submit` button per `<form>`. Outside of forms use `button` (default).
